invoice_details.pre_text: Thank you for choosing our solar solutions. Below you will find the details of your purchase.
invoice_details.post_text: We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you in the future.

product.name: Solar Panel System - Premium
product.description:
• 20 x High-efficiency solar panels
  • Mounting hardware included
  • 25-year warranty
